title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 510.2 - Index of consumers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 510.2 - Index of consumers

State Regulations

Each and every waterworks corporation holding consumer
deposits shall keep, in addition to the records prescribed in section
510.1
of this Part, an index or
indices, alphabetically or geographically arranged, which shall show at all
times the name of each consumer from whom a deposit has been exacted, and whose
said deposit or any part thereof remains unpaid, with appropriate reference in
such index to the consumer's account. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
510.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
